summary: Standalone Follower inspired by envision face and lighting from final fantasy
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7199/6939352507_1c2ea7545a.jpg[/img]

Lightning is a beauty stand alone (no replacing) follower inspired by envision face and lighting from final fantasy with some changes i guess it\'s my mistake that i called here lighting my bad  , She is essential in level 80 , I gave here a default hot armor and a chillrend sword but you can change them to any thing you want and i mean any thing .

Note : i need to trade some things with you works 100%
just make sure you don\'t have any other mods conflict with it 

------------------------
You will find Lighting in Riverwood Sleeping giant inn next to the bar waiting for your epic adventures

Install
--------

Extract content of the file to your Skyrim data
or use Nexus Mod Manager 
make sure that you load both ESM and ESP files 
----------------------------------------------------------------
mods you need to get that same look 
----------------
1 -Covereyes by mrLenski
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869
2 -WSBP - Windsong Skyrim Beauty Project V1 by Windsong.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6066
4 -RANs HeadMesh Variants
skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7127
3 -envision Face by DD AKT (( Necessary ))
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7897
4 -MTOH Soyas hair Standalone by Meister falls off cliff
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7400

so make sure you have them all to get the exact look
-----------------------------------------------------------


IF you like please Endorse Me will make me made more followers and mods 
Enjoy ........
author: xb7bk
